key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to ongoing investigations and class action lawsuits

Credit risk from high delinquency rates and suspension of credit products
Intense competition in Brazil's fintech sector
Operational inefficiencies and customer service issues
controversies: Class action lawsuit alleging misleading business prospects and credit product delinquency rates
Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway selling its position in StoneCo
social_issues: Customer service issues affecting reputation and retention
governance_issues: Allegations of misleading investors about business prospects
Regulatory scrutiny in Brazil's financial sector
